comments.body: Is the result sorted in any way?

No. This will contain all the segment metadata for a partition including the segments which are not actively refereed by the log lineage. Some of these can be partially copied segments which can exist because the copying was failed for some reason.

This method is used by RemotePartitionRemover when a partition is marked for delete.
